$$b=branches$$
$$n=non-terminal~nodes$$

$$ \rho_c= \frac{b}{n}= connection~density$$

$$d=tree~depth, ~or~length~of~path~from~first~passage~to~farthest~leaf$$

$$
d^{\rho_c}= design~structure~measure
$$


$$b=7, n=5, d=4$$
$$d^{\rho_c}=4^{\frac{7}{5}}=6.96$$
